translations.chinese: 是月章邯舉軍降項羽，羽以為雍王。
translations.english: In this month, Zhang Han led his entire army to surrender to Xiang Yu, who enfeoffed him as King of Yong.
In the eighth month, Pei Gong attacked Wuguan and entered Qin.

translations.chinese: 秦相趙高恐，乃殺二世，使人來，欲約分王關中，沛公不許。
translations.english: Qin chancellor Zhao Gao became fearful, so he killed the Second Emperor and sent people to try to make a treaty to divide the kingship of Guanzhong. Pei Gong did not agree.

translations.chinese: 九月，趙高立二 世兄子子嬰為秦王。
translations.english: In the ninth month, Zhao Gao established the Second Emperor's younger brother Zi Ying as King of Qin.
